message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This exceptional item is valued at $12000 by us, reflecting its high quality, unique features, and the effort put into its creation. Given its worth and the benefits it offers, I propose a special introductory price of $10000 for you. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget and preferences. I'm confident you'll find the investment worthwhile.
